name: @progress/kendo-theme-bootstrap
description: Bootstrap v4 theme for Kendo UI
author: Progress

scripts.api-check: npm run api && git diff --exit-code --quiet -- docs/ || (echo -e '\033[0;31mERROR: API docs are out of date' && exit 1)
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run api-check
scripts.prepublishOnly: bash ./build/embed-dependencies 'bootstrap' '@progress/kendo-theme-default' && npm run build && npm run swatches
